name: The Pads Game
description:
The PADS Game.

Welcome to The Pads Game.

Born from my idea, inspired by the Jazz of Glenn Miller and retro design, "The Pads Game" has arrived.

All you have to do is collect as many points as possible by completing full color pads.

Combine strategy, puzzle and logic to train the mind.

Endless levels and points and an addictive gameplay will drag you into your stressful days by relaxing your mind while still doing mental exercises ...

... but there are rules to be respected:

- Quick tap on a pad to rotate
- Drag and drop on another pad with same color to merge
- To score and levels respects the requested "TARGETS"
- Use the "SPECIAL PAD" to destroy all the pads of a color
- The entire playing area is usable except the central slot
- Possibility of world ranking
- Sharing of the "TICKET" score to challenge friends in the skill

Good luck and have fun

The Pads Game
